job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Responsibilities:</u></strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Suitable candidates will be part of Wipro Digital-Intelligent Enterprise practice .The job requires candidates to be proficient in leading a team of ML and NLP developers. Design and develop AI solutions to address business process automation challenges by applying Machine Learning models, Deep Learning, Classification models, statistical methods and NLU/NLP</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong><u>Skills</u></strong></p><p><strong><u><span class="ql-cursor"></span></u></strong></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong Python 2.7 or above programming skills, usage of open source libraries</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience building AI based automation solutions using platforms like IBM Watson/AWS Sagemaker/Azure ML/ Google APIs etc</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Applying innovative ideas to extract information from structured and unstructured document images</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proficient in applying NLP techniques to process unstructured data content</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proficient in modeling techniques such as Entity Extraction, Sequential Modelling (CRF, LSTM etc.) </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proficient with Machine learning (Supervised and UnSupervised) algorithms, Clustering, Classification, PCA, Fisher projections and other algorithm Kmeans, SVM, Random Forest.</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proficient with Word Embeddings (Glove, Word2Vec).</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Team Leading capabilities</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective communication skills</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Agile based development methodology</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Flexibility for Short Term travels to Client locations.</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
